title: Key Features
text: Discover how Oh My Receipt! makes receipt management effortless and organized.

section.title: Effortless Receipt Capture
section.content: Scan and digitize paper receipts with a single tap. Say goodbye to manual entry.

section.title: Simple and Direct Storage
section.content: Save your receipts with ease. No complicated categorizations, just straightforward storage for quick access.

section.title: Secure Cloud Storage
section.content: All your receipts are securely stored in the cloud, accessible from any device whenever you need them.

section.title: Generate Receipts as PDFs
section.content: Turn your saved receipts into organized PDFs with a single tap, making sharing and reporting a breeze.

section.title: Effortless Search and Filters
section.content: Quickly locate any receipt using powerful search and filtering options. No more digging through piles of paper.
